column3: Check the application progress Menu at the right

column4: 1st and 2nd pages marked with a tick, 3rd page is marked orange as active

column3: With a CC license selected, choose Publisher's own license

column4: The CC license deselects automatically and the "attributes" choices appear.

column3: Choose some attributes and try to click on a CC license

column4: "Attributes" question disappears and you can select a CC license

column3: Scroll to the bottom and click the Previous button
ClickPage 3 Copyright & licensing on the progress bar

column4: You are taken back to Page 3 and your answers are preserved.

column3: Complete all fields and click Next
